channel.title: Clan Chat Help
channel.description: I have a 317 with a working clan chat. Is it possible to make it so 1 specific clan chat stays open even when the owner leaves? I hate making it everytime I leave.

item.title: Clan Chat Help
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

I have a 317 with a working clan chat. Is it possible to make it so 1 specific clan chat stays open even when the owner leaves? I hate making it everytime I leave.

Read full topic
